RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 74. Claiming Purse 13500. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500 (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MR CLINE stalked the pace four then three wide into the far turn, rallied to make the lead nearing the quarter pole, set the balance of the pace and edged clear late under confident handling. FISHING FOR FUN pressed the pace two wide and finished gamely for second. SECRET SANCTUARY went evenly. THE EQUINEST made the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the far turn, remained a sharp threat along the rail until deep stretch then weakened. SILVER MATT was restless in the gate, broke awkwardly then failed to menace. SOAKING WET also restless in the gate, was no threat. SMALL BUT FEISTY was antsy in the gate, prompted the pace two wide and was through after a half.

ENTRY.NAME: Silver Matt
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, awkward start, failed to menace

ENTRY.NAME: The Equinest
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace 2nd turn, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Small But Feisty
ENTRY.COMMENT: antsy gate, pressed pace, 2 wide, through after half,

ENTRY.NAME: Secret Sanctuary
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: Mr Cline
ENTRY.OWNER: Nana's Nest and Cline Robert C
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, 4 wide, rallied 3 wide 2nd turn, edged clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Soaking Wet
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate, no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Fishing for Fun
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gamely, second best,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 2 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 27500. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over Since April 8 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race Since March 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (Ohio Registered Foals Pr eferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SEND ME ON saved ground into the far turn, drifted out to the middle of the racetrack entering the stretch, rallied under right handed urging while continuing to drifted out past the middle of the track, made the lead past the furlong marker and won as much the best. DOUGS MORNING PICK into the far turn, began to close two wide, drifted out to the ten path entering the stretch and rallied for second. SPEEDY MOBILE away alertly, set the pace along the inside until mid stretch then was outfinished. GOLDEN MONEY pressed the pace two wide for six furlongs, was forced out to the eight path entering the stretch and lost ground. VISUAL MISSION pressed the pace three wide for six furlongs, was carried out to the nine path at the top of the stretch then weakened. GOING WITH STYLE raced outside through the far turn, stopped, pulled up bleeding from the nostrils past the wire and was walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Dougs Morning Pick
ENTRY.COMMENT: trailed, angled 4 wide 1/4 pole, drifted 10path, clear second

ENTRY.NAME: Speedy Mobile
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace mid stretch, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Send Me On
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved ground 6furs,swung wide,drifted past mid track, much best

ENTRY.NAME: Golden Money
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace 2 wide, forced out, 8path top lane, lost ground,

ENTRY.NAME: Visual Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, forced out 9path top lane, weakened,

ENTRY.NAME: Going With Style
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, stopped, bled, walked off

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 3 6F Dirt CR: 71. Claiming Purse 17000. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE SINCE MAY 8. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Claiming Price $7,500.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE MAN CAN made the lead soon after the start, set all the pace and drew clear through the stretch under right handed urging. HENRY THE CAT pressured the winner two wide and gamely gained second. JUST CHESTER had speed from the start, offered a mild bid along the rail into the stretch then was outfinished. BUCKEYE RUCKUS went evenly. OFTEN ENOUGH failed to menace. JOES A ROCKIN pressed the early pace three wide and faded. MOBIL AT LAST with the second flight four then three wide, failed to respond. CAPTAIN RILEY closed up early, had no rally. PRECIOUS JULES bobbled at the start and was no factor. PLATE IT UP was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Captain Riley
ENTRY.COMMENT: close early, no rally,

ENTRY.NAME: Joes a Rockin
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 3 wide, faded

ENTRY.NAME: Just Chester
ENTRY.COMMENT: good early speed, middle move, inside, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Plate It Up
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Often Enough
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Ruckus
ENTRY.COMMENT: evenly,

ENTRY.NAME: The Man Can
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pace, drew off, right handed urging,

ENTRY.NAME: Precious Jules
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled start, no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Henry the Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, gamely second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Mobil At Last
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 4-3wide, failed to respond,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 78. Claiming Purse 21900. FOR ACCREDITED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 8 Allowed 4lbs. Cla iming Price $16,000.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MISTER MOBIL vied for the lead along the rail down the backstretch, engaged the leaders on the turn, matched strides for the lead until deep stretch and edged clear late under strong handling. POWERFUL PHIL dueled for the lead two wide and finished second best. SWEET LEMON DROP had good early speed three wide, dropped back on the turn, swung wide and came on again late in the seven path. BABA LOOEY contested the lead three wide into the turn and faded in the stretch TIDE RISING passed tiring rivals. KINGOFTHEBUCKEYE with the second flight three wide, was carried out to the eight path at the top of the stretch then lacked the needed response. OHIO EAGLE with the second flight along the rail, moved up on the turn then came up empty. MANGA MAN was no factor. CHISELED JUSTICE was no threat.

ENTRY.NAME: Mister Mobil
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied inside, rallied turn, drifted 4p, battled, edged clear late

ENTRY.NAME: Tide Rising
ENTRY.COMMENT: passed tiring rivals,

ENTRY.NAME: Chiseled Justice
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Ohio Eagle
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, middle move, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Powerful Phil
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 2 wide, second best,

ENTRY.NAME: Baba Looey
ENTRY.COMMENT: dueled 3wide, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Lemon Drop
ENTRY.OWNER: Samuel Klein Jr LLC and Aurora Racing
ENTRY.COMMENT: speed 3 wide, dropped back turn, swung wide, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Manga Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Kingofthebuckeye
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, carried wide, no rally,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 5 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: THE COOKIE MAN away alertly, set all the pace, shook clear in upper stretch and prevailed under brisk handling. OVER THE HILLS chased the winner and held on for second in the four path. CUTLER stalked the pace from the start and finished with good courage along the inside. THE COACHMAN had good early speed between horses two wide, dropped back on the turn, altered course to the six path entering the stretch then came on again late. OTIS OTIS OTIS with the second flight three wide, offered a mild bid into the stretch then was outfinished in the five path. CHACO SPIRIT unhurried early, swung wide and closed ground late in them middle of the racetrack. KREWE CHIEF failed to menace.

ENTRY.NAME: Cutler
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked pace, finished well, inside,

ENTRY.NAME: Chaco Spirit
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, swung wide, late gain mid track

ENTRY.NAME: The Cookie Man
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pace, drew clear, driving,

ENTRY.NAME: The Coachman
ENTRY.COMMENT: close 2wide, altered course 6path, came again,

ENTRY.NAME: Krewe Chief
ENTRY.COMMENT: failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Otis Otis Otis
ENTRY.COMMENT: middle move, 3 wide, outfinished 5path

ENTRY.NAME: Over the Hills
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased, held place,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 6 6F Dirt CR: 65. Allowance Purse 35800. FOR REGISTERED OHIO FOALS THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 8 Allowed 4 lbs. (Claiming Races For $12,500 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INTO GOLD was bumped repeatedly at the start, never far back, rallied four wide under left handed urging to make the lead in deep stretch, drifted out nearing the wire and edged clear under strong handling. K KID unhurried early, closed determinedly five wide, steadied nearing the wire and finished clear for second. STAGE NAME with the second flight along the rail, altered course to the five path in deep stretch and finished with good courage. LUNCHATTHELIZARD made the lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace along the inside into the stretch and weakened late. CAVALETTO found his best stride late. BUCKEYE RED was bumped at the start, prompted the pace three wide into the stretch, gained a narrow lead briefly then came up empty. LOTSA MATCHA was no threat. CONSTITUTION COAL close up along the inside early, faded. OXBOW'S RIDE was no factor. WILDCAT EXPRESS drifted out bumping repeatedly with the winner, dueled for the lead two wide for a half then stopped. THE STEWARDS POSTED THE INQUIRY SIGN BUT TOOK NO ACTION.

ENTRY.NAME: Constitution Coal
ENTRY.COMMENT: close inside, faded,

ENTRY.NAME: Stage Name
ENTRY.OWNER: WinStar Farm LLC and Blazing Meadows Farm LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, inside, altered course 5path, finished well

ENTRY.NAME: K Kid
ENTRY.COMMENT: unhurried early, closed willingly, 5w, steadied late, clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Oxbow's Ride
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Lunchatthelizard
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, inside, weakened late

ENTRY.NAME: Wildcat Express
ENTRY.OWNER: Vigil Alan Boots N Bikinis LLC and Blue Snow Racing Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: drifted out bumped repeatedly start, battled 2w, stopped

ENTRY.NAME: Into Gold
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, rallied 4w, drifted out late, in time

ENTRY.NAME: Buckeye Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start, pressed pace, 3 wide, led, empty,

ENTRY.NAME: Lotsa Matcha
ENTRY.COMMENT: no threat,

ENTRY.NAME: Cavaletto
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late,

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 7 5 1/2F Dirt CR: 93. Starter Optional Claiming Purse 20000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE STARTED FOR A CLAIMING PRICE OF $5,000 OR LESS IN 2022 - 2023 OR CLAIMING PRICE $8,000. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Since April 8 Allowed 2 lbs. A Race Since March 8 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $8,000 (Claiming Races For $5,000 Or Less Not Considered In Weight Allowances) (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: HOLY SAINT away alertly, set all the pace under pressure, drifted to the four path entering the stretch and prevailed in a game effort. FLIPPING FISH with the second flight two wide, dropped inside entering the stretch, rallied steadily along the rail but couldn't handle the winner. LAUDA SPEED with the second flight three wide, finished determinedly in the six path. SHADOW TRACER pressed the pace two wide into the stretch then was outfinished. GEHRIG raced outside and failed to menace. TOE TAPPIN LUKE vied for the lead along the rail into the stretch then faded. FRONTLINER was no factor. TRIGZ TOO close up into the stretch, weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Toe Tappin Luke
ENTRY.COMMENT: vied for lead inside, faded lane

ENTRY.NAME: Holy Saint
ENTRY.COMMENT: away alertly, set pressured pace, drifted 3path, all out,

ENTRY.NAME: Shadow Tracer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed pace, 2 wide, outfinished

ENTRY.NAME: Frontliner
ENTRY.COMMENT: no factor,

ENTRY.NAME: Gehrig
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, failed to menace,

ENTRY.NAME: Flipping Fish
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 2 wide, rallied rail, couldn't pass

ENTRY.NAME: Lauda Speed
ENTRY.COMMENT: second flight, 3 wide, finished determinedly 6path

ENTRY.NAME: Trigz Too
ENTRY.COMMENT: close up, weakened late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: THISTLEDOWN RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 89. Allowance Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 2023. Three Year Olds, 119 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. (Ohio Registered Foals Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ENERGIZER pressed the early pace two wide, dropped back on the turn, came on again in the six path through deep stretch under left handed urging and got up in the final strides. CHANNEL FURY gained a slight lead soon after the start, set a pressured pace into the stretch, edged clear and just missed hanging on. SO DIALED IN raced outside, surged in the seven path late and was narrowly beaten. LAZARUS PROJECT found his best stride late along the rail. WOODLAND WALK matched strides for the lead three then two wide into the stretch and weakened late.

ENTRY.NAME: Channel Fury
ENTRY.COMMENT: rushed to lead, set pressured pace, edged clear, caught

ENTRY.NAME: Lazarus Project
ENTRY.OWNER: Lion Palm Racing Stable and Sixth Gear LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: best stride late rail

ENTRY.NAME: So Dialed In
ENTRY.COMMENT: wide trip, late rally, just missed,

ENTRY.NAME: Energizer
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed 2w, dropped back turn, came again 6path, up in time

ENTRY.NAME: Woodland Walk
ENTRY.COMMENT: matched strides 3 wide, weakened late
